summary: WE HAVE A 2006 MASTERCRAFT X30 BOAT AND MASTERCRAFT TRAILER.  JUST THREE YEARS AND LESS THAN 100 RUNNING HOURS AFTER PURCHASE THE TRAILER BRAKING SYSTEM ALREADY NEEDS ITS MASTER CYLINDER REPLACED AT THE TUNE OF NEARLY $1,000.  SEVERAL FELLOW BOAT OWNERS AND NEIGHBORS HAVE HAD THE SAME PROBLEM, WHICH COULD RESULT IN TRAILER BRAKES NOT WORKING AT ALL AND CAUSE A SAFETY HAZARD.  WE BELIEVE MASTERCRAFT SHOULD ISSUE A RECALL. *TR
